name: AltsDaddy
description: AltsDaddy is the one of the fastest growing independent platforms to live track altcoins, pump history, social mentions, technical anaylsis and soon NFTs, blockchains and KOLs. The native utility token $DDY serves a payment token to purchase memberships on the platform. Founded in January 2022, AltsDaddy has grown to be one of the leading decentralized platforms to track and manage altcoins and their performance.
